dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2816 IH: Great Smoky Mountains National Park Agreement Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meadows introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To authorize a settlement in accordance with the agreement entered into by the Tennessee Valley Authority and the United States Department of the Interior, and counties within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Great Smoky Mountains National Park Agreement Act of 2017.

From funds previously appropriated to the National Park Service in the construction account for that agency in the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2012 (Public Law 112â€“74), the National Park Service shall transfer $35,200,000 to counties within Great Smoky Mountains National Park in accordance with the Memorandum of Agreement entered into by the Tennessee Valley Authority and the United States Department of the Interior, dated February, 2010, that supersedes the agreement of July 30, 1943.
